octeon_soft_instruction_t Struct Reference

#include <octeon_instr.h>

Detailed Description

Format of a instruction presented to the driver.

This structure has the values that get posted to Octeon in addition to other fields that are used by the driver to keep track of the instruction's progress.

Definition at line 35 of file octeon_instr.h.

Field Documentation

uint32_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::alloc_flags

Flags to indicate memory allocated for this instruction.

Used by driver when freeing the soft instruction.

Definition at line 77 of file octeon_instr.h.

octeon_instr_64B_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::command

The PCI instruction to be sent to Octeon.

This is stored in the instr to retrieve the physical address of buffers when instr is freed.

Definition at line 67 of file octeon_instr.h.

void* octeon_soft_instruction_t::dptr

Input data pointer.

It is either pointing directly to input data or to a gather list which is a list of addresses where data is present.

Definition at line 52 of file octeon_instr.h.

uint64_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::exhdr[4]

These headers are used to create a 64-byte instruction.

Definition at line 70 of file octeon_instr.h.

octeon_exhdr_info_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::exhdr_info

Information about the extra headers.

Definition at line 73 of file octeon_instr.h.

uint32_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::gather_bytes

Total data bytes transferred in the gather mode request.

Definition at line 86 of file octeon_instr.h.

void* octeon_soft_instruction_t::gather_ptr

If a gather list was allocated, this ptr points to the buffer used for the gather list.

The gather list has to be 8B aligned, so this value may be different from dptr.

Definition at line 83 of file octeon_instr.h.

octeon_instr_ih_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::ih

The instruction header.

All input commands have this field.

Definition at line 60 of file octeon_instr.h.

octeon_instr_irh_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::irh

Input request header.

octeon_request_info_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::req_info

How the response for the instruction should be handled.

Definition at line 48 of file octeon_instr.h.

void* octeon_soft_instruction_t::rptr

Response from Octeon comes at this address.

It is either pointing to output data buffer directly or to a scatter list which in turn points to output data buffers.

Definition at line 57 of file octeon_instr.h.

uint32_t octeon_soft_instruction_t::scatter_bytes

Total data bytes to be received in the scatter mode request.

Definition at line 95 of file octeon_instr.h.

void* octeon_soft_instruction_t::scatter_ptr

If a scatter list was allocated, this ptr points to the buffer used for the scatter list.

The scatter list has to be 8B aligned, so this value may be different from rptr.
